quest.name: Nowhere to Run
journal: Having given you due warning, Zero would leave you to your own devices.
objectives: Speak with Zero and have her accompany you.
Gather information while Zero is accompanying you.
Accompany Zero to the designated location and then speak with her.
Accompany Zero to the designated location and then speak with her again.
Search for Farfarello while Zero is accompanying you.
Speak with Ciriatto while Zero is accompanying you.
Speak with Ciriatto again while Zero is accompanying you.
Speak with Ciriatto yet again while Zero is accompanying you.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: 'Tis said that a person's domain is a reflection of what abides in their heart. If true, this place may offer a glimpse into Zero's past.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: The longer one lives, the more one yearns for peace. I understand why some would sequester themselves here.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: 'Tis quite a gathering of voidsent. I pray one among them has the knowledge we seek.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Consider yourselves duly warned. If you wish to go among the voidsent here, that is your choice to make.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: All have fled from one master or another. But whether any of those masters in turn served Golbez, I do not know. You must ask them yourselves.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Most have traveled to your world, so it shouldn't be difficult to communicate.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: We shall go about making inquiries at once. Thank you for your counsel.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Once we've learned all we can, let us reconvene at yonder plaza.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: You're going too, of course? In which case, I shall accompany you.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I wish only to observe. Do not expect me to help.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Then it's settled. I'm ready when you are.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: As you may recall, when a larger voidsent is summoned, only its soul makes the journey to the Source.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Upon its arrival, it takes possession of a host body. But during that time, what becomes of its actual body here in the Thirteenth?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The answer to this question may give us valuable insight into cross-rift travel.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: To that end, while asking after Golbez, I shall also see what the voidsent can tell me about their experiences when summoned.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: If a voidsent is too weak to create its own domain, it must join with others for protection.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Alternately, it might devour them in a bid to become stronger, but in so doing risk losing its sense of self.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: 'Tis an unenviable struggle...

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: 'Twas in order to strike down the Cloud of Darkness that my sister crossed over into the void.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: What befell her after she vanished into the gate? How did she become Golbez's captive? These things and more, I hope to learn...

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Ready? Then lead the way. I leave it to you to decide with whom you speak.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Zero is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave Zero behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have Zero accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Small talk.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Part ways with Zero.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Although this is my domain, I don't make a habit of strolling about. 'Tis a strange feeling...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with Zero?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: You have other business? Fine. Come and find me at my abode when you've finished.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Finished tending to your other affairs? Then let us continue on.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ask about Zero's abode.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ask about the plaza.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I call this my abode, but spend hardly any time here. I return only for meditation.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: While physical wounds can be healed by replenishing one's aether, you can't preserve your form if you lose sight of yourself.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Such is the risk inherent in consuming another's soul. It dilutes your sense of self. Alters you inside and out.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: To guard against this, I meditate. Visualize who I am, in a place all my own.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: This is the heart of my domain. Normally it's deserted, but you and yours have drawn everyone out.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I don't recall this statue, though...

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: However it came to be here, I certainly didn't wish for it.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596A
dialogue.text: I thought you were her prey, but they say you're her minions. Which are you?

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596B
dialogue.text: Are you really a mortal? I've never seen a mortal before...

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596C
dialogue.text: <slurp> I bet you taste good. But I can't eat you, else I'll be eaten too...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be accompanied by Zero and have her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Zero has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596A
dialogue.text: To walk around with her like that... You're her minion, then?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: You know I don't take minions. SheHe has some questions, and I want you to answer them.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596A
dialogue.text: Golbez? I don't know that one. Only Scathach.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596A
dialogue.text: When she led us beyond the veil, I grew scared and fled.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596A
dialogue.text: I've been here since. I don't know anyone else, nor do I wish to. That's all I can tell you.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Scathach was a powerful voidsent who ruled over a vast domain. That was a long time ago, though, so I doubt she has any connection to Golbez.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596A
dialogue.text: I told you─I don't know anyone else, nor do I wish to. Leave me be.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596B
dialogue.text: You're one of the mortals! Is it true? When you die over there, you really die?

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596B
dialogue.text: So it is, so it is! What brings you here, then?

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596B
dialogue.text: Ah yes, Golbez. He seeks strong minions to grow his army, so I hear.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596B
dialogue.text: But recently, he stopped doing that. Instead, he devours all.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Perhaps he's gathered enough fodder and is now intent on bolstering his own strength. A sure sign that he is about to make a move.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596B
dialogue.text: By the way, why haven't you died already? Over there, you can do so any time, no? Don't miss your chance, or you'll end up like us.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596C
dialogue.text: <rumble> Stay away from me... If you don't want to be eaten, stay away...

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596C
dialogue.text: Golbez, Golbez... I've heard the name before.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596C
dialogue.text: Ah, I remember! Always speaking of a great crusade. I don't know what that is, but it sounds delicious. <slurp>

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: A crusade, you say? From whom did you hear this?

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596C
dialogue.text: Farfarello. He was a minion of another minion. Went on and on about the terrible things he saw.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I see... Perhaps Farfarello can tell us more.

dialogue.name: VOIDSENT04596C
dialogue.text: Why do you want to know about Golbez? Do you have a crusade too?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Satisfied with what you've learned? Ah─but let's step away before you become too tempting to resist.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: It seems the rumors of Golbez reach even my remote domain.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Fair to assume he's gathering strength for his crusade─whatever that may be.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: But I must say, I wouldn't have guessed that Farfarello once fought in Golbez's army. It's a miracle he survived serving an archfiend.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Ah, I suppose I should explain.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Farfarello is the weakest among us. Constantly in fear of being devoured, he seldom consorts with others.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: The only one he's comfortable with is Ciriatto.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: He's a fellow coward who runs the instant he senses a threat, and won't stop until he's exhausted.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: When their hunger grows too intense, they feed on each other's aether. Such is their relationship.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: But I ramble. You intend to seek out Farfarello, I presume?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Then I'll come with you. He's less likely to hide that way.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Farfarello keeps to the fringes of my domain. This way.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ask about Farfarello's hiding place.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: The voidsent here don't answer to a master. They can do as they please.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: But all must answer to the hunger, and seek out prey when they need aether.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Except Farfarello and Ciriatto, that is─they are content to take from one another. Barring an incident, they dare not venture out.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: When he takes flight, Ciriatto will not seek shelter until he is utterly spent. Farfarello, on the other hand, prefers to hide in the same place. Come.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: Uwaaaaaah! P-Please don't eat me...but I suppose you have to...

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: Oh, whatever will I do now? <whimper>

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Ciriatto... This is rather unexpected. Where is Farfarello?

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: <gulp>

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: Farfarello...isn't here anymore. He's...left. Y-Yes, that's right!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Left? That doesn't sound like him at all.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: W-Well, he's gone, all right? Wh-What more do you want me to say?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: And off he flees, as he is wont to do.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: But something about this doesn't sit well with me...

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: What do you make of Ciriatto's behavior?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: He seemed frightened. Perhaps someone had threatened him?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I don't think he was telling the truth.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I doubt it. Had he been threatened, we wouldn't have found him in one place.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: No, he would run in circles until he could run no more. That's his nature.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: So you think so too.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: As he says, Farfarello is gone. But that is quite unusual.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: As is the fact that Ciriatto, who was clearly frightened by something, chose not to flee but instead hid here, where Farfarello usually─

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: We must go after Ciriatto. Now.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I know Farfarello was our quarry, but Ciriatto's behavior troubles me. We must find him.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: I-I don't have time for this... You'd best keep your distance if you know what's good for you!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Ciriatto, we need to talk.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: Th-There's no time! The wind rises! We must flee!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: The wind rises...? What is he talking about?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: After him.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: Uwaaah, the wind howls! Louder and louder!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: What's gotten into you? What do you mean, the wind rises?

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: When the wind rises, she comes! Barbariccia!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Barba...riccia? Who in the world is that?

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: We must flee, all of us! There's no time!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I don't sense anything, but he seems convinced.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: It's a dead end beyond. We'll corner him.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: Ahhh, it's too late! The wind is already upon us!

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: We're doomed! There's nowhere to run!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: What are you running from?

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: I-I already told you! Barbariccia, the archfiend of wind!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Archfiend, you say?

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: We will be devoured or forced to serve. To fight in the crusade. But it makes no difference. In the end, all are eaten by her or her enemies.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: I didn't want to fight anymore. That's why I fled and came here!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I see. That explains everything...almost.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I thought it was Farfarello who used to serve an archfiend. Not you.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Not you, who always ran at the first sign of trouble. You who now speak as though you were Barbariccia's minion. There's only one explanation...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: He devoured Farfarello...didn't he?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Indeed, that would account for his uncharacteristic behavior.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: So, is that the way of it? Did you devour Farfarello?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: And not just a portion of his aether, but his entire being.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Tell me true, Ciriatto. You devoured Farfarello, didn't you?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: And not just a portion of his aether, but his entire being.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: ...H-How did you know?

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: It wasn't only your behavior that felt strange.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: You felt strange. As if there was more than you present.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Now, I don't believe you would've lost control. More likely it was at Farfarello's behest.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: I can't hide anything from you...

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: I admit it. Farfarello didn't leave. I ate him.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: He feared Barbariccia more than anything. Hated the endless fighting.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: So he begged me to devour him, that he would never have to fight again.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Rather than an eternity of fighting, he chose a moment of pain...

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: For all the good it did. I can still hear his voice in my head. He's frightened, so very frightened...

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: When you're eaten, your essence is blended with that of your devourer. And though you have no control, your consciousness in part endures.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Were this a world where the wheel of life and death still turned, the soul wouldn't linger so stubbornly.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: In time, it would return to the great flow.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: But there's no such end here. No escape. All know this. In making his choice, Farfarello must have been desperate indeed.

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: And now that desperation has joined with Ciriatto's fear, driving him to act erratically.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: This place will become a battlefield. We don't want to be eaten. Neither me nor Farfarello. But there's nowhere to go! Nowhere!

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: Then tell me about Barbariccia. I would know who it is we face.

dialogue.name: FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT
dialogue.text: It's too late. She's as good as here, and no one can escape her winds! No one!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: What little I learned in your absence did not pertain to the archfiends. That discussion can wait until after we've tended to Barbariccia.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Just you wait, Barbariccia. I will have answers from you yet...

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: I have no intention of demanding anyone's aether until afterwards. Weakening you now would only reduce my chances of getting paid.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: The less time we give the enemy to prepare, the better. If everyone is ready, then let us set forth.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Indeed. And yet...my heart weighs heavy for those Barbariccia struck down. Were it not for us, she would not have come here.

dialogue.name: VARSHAHN
dialogue.text: Should you require a moment, Zero...

dialogue.name: MYSTERIOUSPERSON
dialogue.text: For what? Barbariccia took what she could. She was wise to strike quickly─as we would be.

dialogue.name: ESTINIEN
dialogue.text: Agreed. This is no time for sentiment. Only the battle matters now.
